I got the xl so it would be baggy,… it was NOT baggy it was tight. It looks okay ig…it’s not great material it’s not soft fuzzy.. it’s like a north face jacket washed 7 times. But the only correct listing is it’s black… only thing you can count on these days to be honest😂😂

This was a such a disappointing product. It is not the same material as the photo shows, size is way smaller, and overall just totally different quality than shown and described.

The fabric isn't what I was expecting. The inside is fleece and the outside is an almost raincoat (?) texture. I thought that it would be more soft inside and that the outside was more like a cloth, so the material isn't what I was expecting. I normally wear a Large, but I looked at the sizing chart and ordered a XXL. It still fit like it was a fitted jacket rather than the baggy look I measured for. Giving it 2 stars because it is, in fact, a black reversible jacket, but it isn't what I was expecting and definitely not what I paid almost $50 for. I will be returning it.
Ordered one for granddaughter, then had to order another for the other granddaughter. they both like it so well
Great

The description for this item is confusing- how can something be sherpa fleece and fur? We chose to purchase this because the photos clearly show one side to be fur, so that it should be reversible. The jacket is most certainly not fur on one side, but rather a thin "sherpa" fleece, so it is not the pretty reversible jacket pictured. The fit is okay, but this is not at all what we expected. We are very disappointed. This is one of the most misleading products we've ever purchased on Amazon. The product description/pictures need to be corrected immediately!

I like the color and the material of the jacket.  The jacket itself is very lightweight which is perfect for this upcoming fall!  It fits very well and looks nice on.  It would go well in to dress up a pair of jeans.  I got it in an extra large, and it fits perfectly.  The price is reasonabe as well.

评论概述: PAY ATTENTION TO THE SIZE CHART
评论详情: The size chart puts the 2X as a US size 8-10. I normally wear a 14-16 and it fits if I'm wearing a light shirt but barely. It comes right to the waist but looking at the size chart it makes sense why. It is soft and cute but not well made and the zipper is cheap, it will likely break before the end of the cold season with consistent wear.

评论概述: Super warm and stylish, available in great colors
评论详情: I recently purchased the Sumleno Sherpa Jacket, and it has quickly become my go-to piece for chilly days. The reversible feature is a game-changer, allowing me to switch between the plush sherpa side and the textured fleece depending on my mood and outfit. The zip-up design adds a touch of Y2K nostalgia, which I absolutely adore. It's incredibly warm and comfortable, perfect for those brisk morning walks or cozy evenings out. The loose fit gives it a casual yet stylish vibe, and the pockets are a practical touch. I've worn it to coffee dates and weekend trips, receiving compliments each time. It's a versatile jacket that combines fashion with function, and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. The size chart was spot on, ensuring a great fit. I'd definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a trendy, cozy addition to their wardrobe.
Runs small SUPER soft and comfortable and warm Love the baggy fit Nice good Reversible but I definitely prefer the Sherpa inside Very cute design, love this jacket
The sizing is off on this jacket. It is cut small. The reversible style is nice. I like how it looks so oversized.
This jacket is made up of premium quality material, extra fluffy and light weight. Also looks pretty warm.

Okay, first... you guys have got to look at the size chart before ordering.  This jacket is not based on our U.S. standard sizing.  I normally wear a small/medium, and got this in an XL.  I was going to get it in an XXL, but it wasn't available to me.  I am 5'6", about 150, 34D (VS), 27/28 in jeans, 40 inch hips, and an hourglass.  I normally wear a small, and generally get a medium in jackets to accommodate shirts underneath.  Based on the size chart, I was going to get an XXL to make it fit like it does in the description images, but as I said, the XL was the largest option available to me.  An XXL would have fit like the pics in the description pics perfectly, but the XL still fits oversized... just slightly less oversized than in the description photos.  As for the jacket itself, it is SO COMFORTABLE.  I am going to LIVE in it this winter.  The shell is soft, but the inside (faux fur) is even softer.  It's not stiff AT ALL.  I'm in love.
The jacket is very warm and lightweight,  it keeps me comfortable and it is  super soft and not bulky..  great quality, perfect fit.
